page.title: 14Hobbies
page.content: We found out from the questionnaires that most people had a hobby.In fact only 15 people did not have a hobby out of the 200 questionnaires we got back. The most popular hobby was{sport.} There were 141 people who enjoyed it. These sports included{golf,snooker, {swimming}and{windsurfing.} The second and third most popular hobbies were{gardening}with 68 people and{reading}with 61 people. Some people enjoyed their work so much that it was one of their hobbies. There were 22 which could be counted as jobs. Some of the more unusual hobbies were{aerobics,philatelist}and doing{ {jigsaws. }
